titleHead: Not attending hearing - Appeal a benefit decision - GOV.UK
title: You have chosen not to attend the hearing
sendInEvidence: You can still send evidence to support your appeal. You'll receive the address to send it in the post after submitting your appeal.
changeYouMind: If you change your mind about attending the hearing, you can contact the tribunal. Please note that you will not receive any email or text message notifications because you have chosen not to attend a hearing.
